name: Blind's Best Friend
description:
This game is my participation to Brakeys's second Game Jam.

The theme of the Jam was "Love Is Blind". I went with the conventional approach of "blind" as in the handicap, but adding some flavor.

In this game, you control a guide dog, helping out your master getting through caves, doors and eventually outside ! A modest puzzle platformer in 2D with voxel art graphics.

This project was made entirely by myself, without the use of external assets.

I hope you enjoy, and thanks for playing !
